alert.title: Flash Cross-Domain Wildcard Allow-Http-Request-Headers-From Headers
alert.discussion: Vega has detected that the resource has specified an insecure Flash cross-domain policy. The crossdomain.xml file has set the headers attribute for allow-http-request-headers-from to a wildcard value. This means that arbitrary headers will be accepted in cross-domain requests.
alert.remediation: Configure the cross-domain policy file to accept a limited range of safe headers such as "SOAPAction".

references.url: Adobe Flash Player security - Website controls (policy files)
